0:
--------------------
Text: The Iron Church or The Cast Iron Church is a term which has been used to refer to any of the three churches built in Liverpool in the early 19th century by John Cragg, who ran the Mersey Iron Foundry.
Triplets:<The Iron Church
2:
--------------------
Text: The Iron Church:  Two of these churches are still in existence and are active Anglican parish churches.
